profileScraperMode.title: Profile Scraper Mode (change this to find email)
profileScraperMode.description: Choose the mode for scraping LinkedIn profiles. 'Profile details' scrapes detailed profile information, while 'Profile details + email search' attempts to find the email address of the profile owner.

queries.title: Target URLs
queries.description: List of LinkedIn profile URLs or Public Identifiers (last part in the URL) to scrape.

urls.title: Profile URLs
urls.description: List of LinkedIn profile URLs to scrape. Provide at least one of the 3 fields: URLs or Public Identifiers or Profile IDs

publicIdentifiers.title: Public Identifiers (last part in the URL)
publicIdentifiers.description: List of LinkedIn Public Identifiers. Provide at least one of the 3 fields: URLs or Public Identifiers or Profile IDs

profileIds.title: LinkedIn Profile IDs
profileIds.description: List of LinkedIn profile IDs to scrape. Provide at least one of the 3 fields: URLs or Public Identifiers or Profile IDs
